full_output.summary: Passionate Front-end developer with proficiency in React, committed to building dynamic and responsive web applications. Eager to leverage my skills in a collaborative environment to enhance user experiences and contribute to innovative projects.

projects.name: Marvel Superhero Hunter
projects.description: Developed a dynamic Super-Hero Hunter application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Leveraged a Marvel Heroes API to fetch and showcase a diverse range of superhero characters in the UI. Implemented advanced search functionality using JavaScript, enabling users to easily find superheroes by name or specific keywords, and Incorporated a Favorite button for users to mark their preferred superheroes as favorite. Integrated a Get Details button in each superhero dialog box, allowing users to access comprehensive information about a particular superhero with a single click.

projects.name: Contact List App
projects.description: Developed a robust contact list management application using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Implemented a user-friendly interface displaying contact details fetched through API. Utilized JavaScript to dynamically update and manipulate contact information within the UI. Implemented user-driven functionalities, including the ability to delete and modify contact details.

projects.name: Habit Tracking App
projects.description: Developed an efficient Habit Tracking application using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented a seamless user experience with features that enable users to add, edit, and delete habits effortlessly. Incorporated a user-friendly interface allowing users to add new habits with a specified name. Utilized React state management to dynamically update the habit list in the UI. Introduced a weekly tracking system, allowing users to monitor and analyze their habits on a week-to-week basis. Users can easily view the weekly progress of any habit by clicking the Week View button.

full_output.name: KRISHNA KUMAR PANDIT
